children.text: You can also add sub events to primary code blocks by right clicking on a block and selecting "add sub event" from the secondary drop down menu brought up by highlighting "Add", I've left another sub event unfinished below because I want to see if you can fill it out. More information is below.

The default value of difficulty (0) represents a hard difficulty. This value (1) represents a normal difficulty, which will remove the four diagonal facing rats (Rat_NE, Rat_NW, Rat_SE, & Rat_SW). I've already set up the trigger for this sub event, so you'll just need to set up the actions. (Hint: You'll need an individual action for each diagonal facing rat, trying to execute an action from the Rats family will have the action apply to all 8 rats)
